NEUTRAL.name: Pummel
NEUTRAL.description: Pounds with fore­ legs or tail.

NEUTRAL.name: Lucky Strike
NEUTRAL.description: Throws coins. Gets them back later.

NEUTRAL.name: Rapid Jab
NEUTRAL.description: Lets the user get in the first hit.

NEUTRAL.name: Lullaby
NEUTRAL.description: May cause the foe to fall asleep.

NEUTRAL.name: Regenerate
NEUTRAL.description: Recovers up to half the user’s maximum HP.

NEUTRAL.name: War Posture
NEUTRAL.description: A dance that in­ creases ATTACK.

NEUTRAL.name: Reckless Charge
NEUTRAL.description: A tackle that also hurts the user.

FIRE.name: Blazing Charge
FIRE.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user sustains serious damage, too.

FIRE.name: Burning Strike
FIRE.description: A fiery punch. May cause a burn.

FIRE.name: Hot Coal
FIRE.description: The foe is attacked with small flames. The foe may suffer a burn.

FIRE.name: Ember Ward
FIRE.description: The user's intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.

FIRE.name: Ghost Burn
FIRE.description: Inflicts a burn on the foe with intense fire.

FIRE.name: Thermal Overload
FIRE.description: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

FIRE.name: Flamethrower
FIRE.description: A powerful stream of fire. May cause a burn.

FIRE.name: Flame Charge
FIRE.description: Cloaked in flame, the user attacks. Boosts Speed.

FIRE.name: Lava Plume
FIRE.description: Scarlet flames engulf the foe. High burn chance.

FIRE.name: Fire Spin
FIRE.description: Traps the foe in a ring of fire.

WATER.name: Tsunami Strike
WATER.description: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user and raises the user’s action speed.

WATER.name: Bubble Burst
WATER.description: An attack that may lower SPEED.

WATER.name: Tide Rush
WATER.description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

WATER.name: Drain Bubble
WATER.description: The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the target. It then absorbs water and restores its HP by half the damage taken by the target.

WATER.name: Claw Crusher
WATER.description: Has a high criti­ cal hit ratio.

ELECTRIC.name: Storm Charge
ELECTRIC.description: The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.

ELECTRIC.name: Volt Cannon
ELECTRIC.description: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Claw stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.

ELECTRIC.name: Lightning Strike
ELECTRIC.description: An electric punch. It may paralyze.

ELECTRIC.name: Spark
ELECTRIC.description: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

ELECTRIC.name: Instant Jolt
ELECTRIC.description: The user attacks the target with bursts of electricity at high speed. This move always goes first and results in a critical hit.

ELECTRIC.name: Shock Wave
ELECTRIC.description: A move that may cause paralysis.

ELECTRIC.name: Store Energy
ELECTRIC.description: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.

ELECTRIC.name: Static Field
ELECTRIC.description: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Claw stat.

ELECTRIC.name: Thunder Rush
ELECTRIC.description: A life-risking tackle that slightly hurts the user.

ELECTRIC.name: Volt Strike
ELECTRIC.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

GRASS.name: Radiant Edge
GRASS.description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

GRASS.name: Stem Strike
GRASS.description: Whips the foe with slender vines.

GRASS.name: Thorn Guard
GRASS.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

GRASS.name: Spore Shock
GRASS.description: A move that may paralyze the foe.

GRASS.name: Dream Pollen
GRASS.description: May cause the foe to fall asleep.

GRASS.name: Fiber Shield
GRASS.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising the user’s Defense stat.

GRASS.name: Branch Breaker
GRASS.description: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

ICE.name: Frost Pike
ICE.description: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

ICE.name: Frozen Knuckle
ICE.description: An icy punch. May cause freezing.

ICE.name: Northern Light
ICE.description: An attack that may lower ATTACK.

ICE.name: Quick Freeze
ICE.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them. This move always goes first.

ICE.name: Deep Freeze
ICE.description: An extremely powerful but inaccurate chilling attack.

ICE.name: Frozen Crush
ICE.description: The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch.

ICE.name: Chill Blast
ICE.description: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

ICE.name: Snowstorm
ICE.description: An attack that may freeze the foe.

MARTIAL.name: Chi Burst
MARTIAL.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Shell.

MARTIAL.name: Edge Strike
MARTIAL.description: Has a high criti­ cal hit ratio.

MARTIAL.name: Blitz Punch
MARTIAL.description: A fast punch that lands first.

MARTIAL.name: Anticipate
MARTIAL.description: Evades attack that turn. It may fail.

MARTIAL.name: Vitality Punch
MARTIAL.description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

MARTIAL.name: Power Stance
MARTIAL.description: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK and DEFENSE.

MARTIAL.name: Scissor Chop
MARTIAL.description: Has a high criti­ cal hit ratio.

VENOM.name: Toxin Blast
VENOM.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.

VENOM.name: Noxious Burst
VENOM.description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

VENOM.name: Corrosive
VENOM.description: An attack that may lower DEFENSE.

VENOM.name: Sludge Shot
VENOM.description: An attack that may poison the foe.

VENOM.name: Toxic Shield
VENOM.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

VENOM.name: Venom Dust
VENOM.description: A move that may poison the foe.

VENOM.name: Deadly Dose
VENOM.description: A poison move with increasing damage.

VENOM.name: Detoxify
VENOM.description: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

VENOM.name: Toxin Spray
VENOM.description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Claw, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

EARTH.name: Earth Cleaver
EARTH.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

EARTH.name: Desert Fury
EARTH.description: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This also leaves the target with a burn.

EARTH.name: Ground Slam
EARTH.description: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s defensive stats.

EARTH.name: Earth Stomp
EARTH.description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

EARTH.name: Burning Dunes
EARTH.description: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

EARTH.name: Dust Recovery
EARTH.description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

EARTH.name: Earth Splitter
EARTH.description: An extremely powerful but inaccurate seismic attack.

EARTH.name: Club Strike
EARTH.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

EARTH.name: Dig Attack
EARTH.description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

AIR.name: Cyclone
AIR.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

AIR.name: Reckless Swoop
AIR.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

AIR.name: Wind Puff
AIR.description: Whips up a strong gust of wind.

AIR.name: Perch
AIR.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

AIR.name: Downdraft
AIR.description: Envelops the foe with down to sharply reduce ATTACK.

AIR.name: Sky Razor
AIR.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

AIR.name: Air Cannon
AIR.description: Has a high criti­ cal hit ratio.

AIR.name: Heaven Charge
AIR.description: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds, although it lowers its own Defense and Shell in the process.

PSYCHE.name: Mental Crush
PSYCHE.description: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

PSYCHE.name: Fate Strike
PSYCHE.description: An attack that hits on 3rd turn.

PSYCHE.name: Mind Ray
PSYCHE.description: An attack that may confuse the foe.

PSYCHE.name: Perplex
PSYCHE.description: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the foe confused.

PSYCHE.name: Mirror Mind
PSYCHE.description: Reflects special effects back to the attacker.

PSYCHE.name: Mesmerize
PSYCHE.description: May put the foe to sleep.

PSYCHE.name: Dream Drain
PSYCHE.description: Steals HP from a sleeping victim.

PSYCHE.name: Sixth Sense
PSYCHE.description: Attacks with a peculiar power. May cause flinching.

PSYCHE.name: Thought Edge
PSYCHE.description: The user tears at the foe with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

INSECT.name: Insect Wail
INSECT.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the foe’s Shell stat.

INSECT.name: Hive Strike
INSECT.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

INSECT.name: Glitter Breeze
INSECT.description: A powdery attack that may raise abilities.

INSECT.name: Beacon Blast
INSECT.description: A strange beam attack that may confuse the foe.

INSECT.name: Aggro Dust
INSECT.description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

INSECT.name: Bioluminescence
INSECT.description: Flashes a light that sharply raises SP. ATK.

INSECT.name: Web Trap
INSECT.description: A move that lowers the foe's SPEED.

INSECT.name: Exo Slam
INSECT.description: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This attack may make the target flinch.

STONE.name: Cosmic Stone
STONE.description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Claw stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.

STONE.name: Primal Force
STONE.description: An attack that may raise all stats.

STONE.name: Stone Throw
STONE.description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

STONE.name: Geo Barrier
STONE.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

STONE.name: Stone Sharpen
STONE.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

STONE.name: Crude Coat
STONE.description: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target’s Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

STONE.name: Avalanche
STONE.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

STONE.name: Mineral Blade
STONE.description: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

GHOST.name: Phantom Strike
GHOST.description: The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe used Protect.

GHOST.name: Spirit Volley
GHOST.description: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

GHOST.name: Curse Throw
GHOST.description: The user attacks the target by controlling the target’s item. The move fails if the target doesn’t have an item.

GHOST.name: Phantom Fist
GHOST.description: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

GHOST.name: Phantom Slash
GHOST.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

GHOST.name: Ghost Rush
GHOST.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the foe from behind. This move always goes first.

GHOST.name: Shadow Ball
GHOST.description: Hurls a shadowy blob. May lower Shell.

GHOST.name: Hex
GHOST.description: Relentlessly attacks. More powerful against statused foes.

GHOST.name: Curse
GHOST.description: Sacrifices HP to place a curse on the foe. Deals damage each turn.

DRAGON.name: Vortex
DRAGON.description: Whips up a tornado to attack.

DRAGON.name: Serpent Form
DRAGON.description: A mystical dance that ups ATTACK and SPEED.

DRAGON.name: Serpent Tackle
DRAGON.description: The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

DRAGON.name: Reality Rip
DRAGON.description: The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

DRAGON.name: Dragon Claw
DRAGON.description: Sharp claws slash the foe. A reliable dragon attack.

DRAGON.name: Dragon Pulse
DRAGON.description: A shockwave generated by the mouth. Reliable special attack.

DRAGON.name: Draco Meteor
DRAGON.description: Calls down meteors. Harshly lowers Claw after use.

DRAGON.name: Dragon Tail
DRAGON.description: Strikes with a hard tail. May cause flinching.

SHADOW.name: Shadow Assault
SHADOW.description: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This attack lowers the user’s Defense.

SHADOW.name: Burning Rage
SHADOW.description: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

SHADOW.name: Dirty Trick
SHADOW.description: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage.

SHADOW.name: Gnash
SHADOW.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

SHADOW.name: Swipe
SHADOW.description: While attacking, it may steal the foe’s held item.

SHADOW.name: Hijack
SHADOW.description: Steals the effects of the move the foe uses next.

SHADOW.name: Deceive
SHADOW.description: Confuses the foe, but raises its SP. ATK.

SHADOW.name: Void Sleep
SHADOW.description: The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.

SHADOW.name: Malicious Intent
SHADOW.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user’s Claw.

SHADOW.name: Final Curse
SHADOW.description: The user faints and lowers the foe’s abilities.

SHADOW.name: Shadow Wave
SHADOW.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

SHADOW.name: Shadow Blade
SHADOW.description: The user slashes the foe the instant an opportunity arises. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

METAL.name: Metal Grinder
METAL.description: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn’t turned into a terrain.

METAL.name: Iron Fist
METAL.description: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always goes first.

METAL.name: Metal Sphere
METAL.description: The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss.

METAL.name: Royal Guard
METAL.description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

METAL.name: Steel Skin
METAL.description: Hardens the body’s surface to sharply raise DEFENSE.

METAL.name: Iron Wail
METAL.description: Emits a horrible screech that sharply lowers SP. DEF.

METAL.name: Metal Skull
METAL.description: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

METAL.name: Flash Cannon
METAL.description: Gathers light energy and fires it. May lower Shell.

METAL.name: Metal Claw
METAL.description: Strikes with metallic claws. May raise Attack.

METAL.name: Steel Wing
METAL.description: Wings turn to steel and strike. May raise Defense.

MYSTIC.name: Bloom Blast
MYSTIC.description: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Claw stat.

MYSTIC.name: Soothing Cry
MYSTIC.description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

MYSTIC.name: Life Kiss
MYSTIC.description: The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

MYSTIC.name: Trick Guard
MYSTIC.description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

MYSTIC.name: Earth Magic
MYSTIC.description: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Claw, Shell, and Speed stats on the next turn.
